text: momineen momineen ko chhod ke kaafiron ko apana saraparast na banaain aur jo aisa karega to usase khuda se kuchh sarokaar nahin magar (is qism kee tadabeeron se) kisee tarah un (ke shar) se bachana chaaho to (khair) aur khuda tumako apane hee se daraata hai aur khuda hee kee taraf laut kar jaana hai
